page.title: 10Employment
page.content: {TWO GIRLS,AGED TEN,WRITE: Many people in this area are unemployed. Many older people worked on the docks but they have nearly all closed down except for the Container Base where the grain comes in. {There were lots of jobs for people {in the sugar and cardboard box plants {and the tobacco factory on Commercial {Road but they too have all closed down While many of the men worked on the docks or went to sea,many women worked as cleaners in hospitals and offices. {The sugar factory provided many jobs {but when it recently closed down it {made many people redundant. { }Many of the young people in this area don't have a special skill or trade because there are not enough factories to take on apprentices. {Many people have been out of work {for as long as eleven years. }
